body_html:
I think this TODO is reminiscent from before we added CosineSimilarity. Indeed, in lua-torch, we have a CosineDistance function that is actually performing the cosine similarity.
I think we can remove the TODO.

body:
I think this TODO is reminiscent from before we added `CosineSimilarity`. Indeed, in lua-torch, we have a `CosineDistance` function that is actually performing the cosine similarity.
I think we can remove the TODO.
